name: GuesstheMovieGame
0:
”Alexa, open movie game”
”Alexa, play movie game”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: movie game
des:
Do you think you know your movies? Play the all new guess the movie quiz from TVGuide.co.uk. Alexa will give you the synopsis of a movie and you have to guess the movie. Just say the name of the movie when Alexa has finished.

To start, just say "Alexa, play Movie Game".
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
